* City Council District 6

City Council District 6
-----------------------

![](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/storage/images/VEnCSbWeArMurixnNnUYifB086lZW6PAryw5S27P.jpg)

Tim Collins, District 6
-----------------------

Tim Collins was elected to the Lubbock City Council in District 6 on May 4, 2024.

Collins is the owner of Collins Tile & Stone and is proud to call the City of Lubbock home. Tim is a proven leader who has been involved in various leadership roles in Lubbock. Tim chaired the Lubbock Entertainment and Performing Arts Association and led the development and fundraising efforts for the Buddy Holly Hall of Performing Arts and Sciences. He also chaired the Lubbock Economic Development Alliance and Market Lubbock, as well as the Lubbock Chamber of Commerce Board of Directors. He serves as Vice Chair of the Lubbock County Local Government Corporation for the Lubbock County Expo Center Board and is Vice President of the Lubbock Reese Redevelopment Authority.

As a member of the Lubbock City Council, Tim strives to attract new businesses into the community, find new and innovative ways to revitalize downtown, and focus on sustainable development. Tim is dedicated to serving the community and is committed to transparent and accessible leadership. Tim strongly believes in the value of community involvement and is passionate to serve his neighbors in District 6 and all of Lubbock.

Tim is happily married to Ava, a former schoolteacher who now helps Tim run Collins Tile. Together they have two children, Leslie and Clay. Leslie is an assistant provost at Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center and Clay continues to build the Collins legacy with the family business.
